title: Spirax Sarco UK leading by example with employee wellbeing education.
description: This past week Spirax Sarco UK trusted Wellmi to deliver education to it's staff on physical and mental wellbeing as part of it's EMEAconference. Everyone attending enjoyed the latest in thought provoking education on physical wellbeing, nutrition and mental wellbeing. Well done Spirax Sarco UK for taking such a fantastic approach to the welfare of your workforce.

blocks.headingText: Spirax Sarco UK leading by example with employee wellbeing education.
blocks.text:
This past week Spirax Sarco UK trusted Wellmi to deliver education to it's staff on physical and mental wellbeing as part of it's EMEAconference. 

Everyone attending enjoyed content delivered across the three days included Mindfulness techniques such as EFT, Physical wellbeing elements such as desk Pilates and nutritional education and discussion.

With some amazing efforts from the team with their paper airplane creations (all part of the Physical Wellbeing In The Workplace workshop).

Well done Spirax Sarco UK for taking such a fantastic approach to the welfare of your workforce. We can't wait to work with you and brilliant team again soon.
